analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: Systematic Deterioration Mandates Tactical De-risking. The current GMS of 46 signifies systemic fragility, reinforced by an accelerating downward OGV vector. Heightened volatility synchronized with a 2.8% expansion in high-yield credit spreads indicates a broad erosion of risk appetite. While net liquidity remains stable, the contraction in cyclical proxies and geopolitical escalation in the Strait of Hormuz exacerbates tail-risk convexity. Beta momentum undergoes severe degradation. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.EN: Systematic Deterioration Mandates Tactical De-risking. The current GMS of 46 signifies systemic fragility, reinforced by an accelerating downward OGV vector. Heightened volatility synchronized with a 2.8% expansion in high-yield credit spreads indicates a broad erosion of risk appetite. While net liquidity remains stable, the contraction in cyclical proxies and geopolitical escalation in the Strait of Hormuz exacerbates tail-risk convexity. Beta momentum undergoes severe degradation. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.ES: El deterioro sistÃ©mico exige reducciÃ³n de riesgo. El GMS de 46 indica fragilidad del rÃ©gimen, reforzada por un vector OGV descendente. La expansiÃ³n de la volatilidad y el aumento del 2.8% en los diferenciales de crÃ©dito high-yield revelan una erosiÃ³n del apetito por el riesgo. Aunque la liquidez neta es estable, la escalada en el Estrecho de Ormuz y la contracciÃ³n de activos cÃ­clicos exacerban la convexidad del riesgo de cola. El impulso del beta experimenta una degradaciÃ³n severa. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.ID: Deteriorasi Sistemik Menuntut De-risking Taktis. Skor GMS 46 menandakan kerapuhan rezim, diperkuat oleh vektor OGV yang menurun. Lonjakan volatilitas dan ekspansi spread kredit high-yield sebesar 2,8% mengindikasikan pengikisan risk appetite. Meskipun likuiditas neto stabil, eskalasi geopolitik di Selat Hormuz dan kontraksi proksi siklikal memperburuk konveksitas tail-risk. Momentum beta mengalami degradasi parah seiring penguatan DXY yang mencerminkan pelarian ke aset aman. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]

reports.DE: Systematische Verschlechterung erzwingt De-Risking. Der GMS von 46 signalisiert fragile Regimebedingungen, verstÃ¤rkt durch einen negativen OGV-Vektor. Die VolatilitÃ¤tsausweitung und eine Spread-Expansion bei High-Yield-Anleihen um 2,8% offenbaren eine schwindende Risikobereitschaft. WÃ¤hrend die NettoliquiditÃ¤t stagniert, verschÃ¤rfen die geopolitische Eskalation in der StraÃŸe von Hormus und die Kontraktion zyklischer Proxys die Tail-Risk-KonvexitÃ¤t. Das Beta-Momentum erfÃ¤hrt eine signifikante Degradation. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
reports.FR: La dÃ©tÃ©rioration systÃ©mique impose un dÃ©-risquage. Le GMS de 46 signale une fragilitÃ© du rÃ©gime, renforcÃ©e par un vecteur OGV descendant. L'expansion de la volatilitÃ© et l'Ã©largissement des spreads de crÃ©dit high-yield de 2,8 % indiquent une Ã©rosion de l'appÃ©tit pour le risque. Bien que la liquiditÃ© nette soit stable, l'escalade gÃ©opolitique dans le dÃ©troit d'Ormuz et la contraction des proxys cycliques accentuent la convexitÃ© du risque de queue. Le momentum du bÃªta subit une dÃ©gradation sÃ©vÃ¨re. [ACTION: WAIT FOR PULLBACK]
